title: Trump’s Desperate Attempt to Bully the Fed
full_text: Trump’s Desperate Attempt to Bully the Fed. A criminal investigation of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will test whether Republican loyalty to the president has any limits.. The Trump administration has opened a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on grounds so flimsy and transparently hypocritical that it is difficult to know whether anybody … [+4924 chars]
